signals.problem_statement: The customer is experiencing difficulties with screen sharing during the training session.
signals.customer_ask: Can I have, if I hang on one sec?
signals.context: Team training session with multiple participants

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unable to locate the Hiver application after logging in.
signals.customer_ask: I can't bloody find it now.
signals.context: Team training session with multiple participants

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unclear about the functionality of the tagging system and its limitations.
signals.customer_ask: Can you take us through the personal settings?
signals.context: Team training session with multiple participants

signals.problem_statement: The customer is not aware of the advanced functionalities available in the product.
signals.customer_ask: Do we have the AI features from the record?
signals.context: Team training session with multiple participants
